title: WTB Mid-Tier backs & Carolina Brights & BL 350
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTB Mid-Tier backs & Carolina Brights & BL 350
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Been pretty quiet lately for my collection.  Would love to add some rare backs, but I'd be happy with just some interesting mid-tiers as well.  Looking for a bunch of Tolstois, Cycles, ABs, Hindus (only major leaguers and no paper loss), and Old Mills (I mainly only need poses from the tougher 150-350 Series).

If you have anything you might part with, please shoot me an email at:

[url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
